    The Class Converter to use for converting raw files into rdf formatted files
    Author:
    Felix Conrads

      • rawToFormat

        public static void rawToFormat(java.lang.String converter,
               java.lang.String outputFormat,
               java.lang.String path,
               java.lang.String oPath,
               java.lang.String graphURI,
               java.util.logging.Logger log)
                        throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                               java.lang.InstantiationException,
                               java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Converts given files in a path through a given converter class to files in an output path
        Parameters:
        converter - the converter class name
        outputFormat - the output format
        path - the path of the files
        oPath - the output path in which the files should be written
        graphURI - the graph to use (can be null)
        log - the logger to use for logging
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - the SAX exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - the parser configuration exception
        java.lang.InstantiationException - the instantiation exception
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - the illegal access exception
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - the class not found exception
